post.html:
Articles look best with a cover, but the platform will fill in missing covers with a placeholder to ensure the site doesn’t break.

It will also fill in missing authors with the site default.

authornote.html: Ducky Devine. Ducky is a fictional character who is a placeholder author for this content. Ducky likes long walks, muddy puddles, and catfood. Ducky has authored a number of technical articles and books, including “quack quack” and Quacked.
